Header.title: Official Visit
Header.paragraph: We are a team of marketing and technical experts helping collegiate partners build out their digital presence, specifically targeting recruits and their guardians

Team.name: Mike Nowoswiat
Team.job: Mike Nowoswiat is the founder of the most accurate college football preview publication since 2012, Pick Six Previews, and a voter for numerous postseason awards and All-American teams. His branding studies have changed the way recruiting offices have operated and athletic departments have branded.

Team.name: Marcus Tewksbury
Team.job: Marcus Tewksbury has a deep technical expertise in building digital products. He has served in numerous leadership roles including Global Vice President for Product Strategy at Experian and Chief Technical Officer at On Campus Marketing, the leader in endorsed marketing to college students and parents. Marcus has built thousands of collegiate websites.

Features.title: Consideration
Features.text: Search Google, Scan NFL Rosters, Talk to former Teammates
